subtitle: Why not treat the family to this delicious alternative to the ever-popular Chinese stir fry.

method.text: Place the beef in a bowl with the soy sauce, tomato puree, half the oil and garlic. Season to taste. Toss well, cover and leave to marinate for 1 hour.
Heat the remaining oil in a large frying pan or wok. Add the onion and peppers and fry for 3 min or until softened. Remove from pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Place the marinated beef and any remaining marinade in the frying pan. Fry together for 5 min or until well sealed. Remove from pan and set aside with the onion mixture.
Heat the remaining oil in the pan. Add the turmeric and mustard seeds. Fry for 1 min. Stir in the flour. Cook for 1 min.
Gradually stir in the beef stock until all is incorporated. Bring to the boil.
Place the onion and beef mixture in an ovenproof casserole dish with the water chestnuts, cashew nuts and beansprouts.
Pour over the stock. Stir well. Cover and place in the oven to cook for 60 min, stirring halfway through.
Transfer to a warmed serving dish. Adjust seasoning and serve.
